Aniwaryenma.  Jathi wadii  anwar menna obata  hodama  pilithura.  Obath  kalayak   sinhalayo  hanwadu gehuwa  sinhalaya  jarhiwade  getum athi karanne  sinhalayo  kiyala.

Api eda idanma  obawa  pilikul  kara . Oba sinhala  musaluwek nisa.  Me  lamaya diha  balalawath  hedunoth hodaii.  Ada  obala weni  kuhaka  anthawadiyo  nisai  me wage  iranamak  ratata  ath une.  Thamuntanam  godak  sathutu arhi neda.  Mokada  thamunlage unmai  sinhalayo  meruwe.

Anthawadii kiyana  kotasata  thamun  aythi kenek.   Balanawa me lamala  igena gaththa  sinhala pasalaka.  Ada inna thena  karana de.  Katha karana vidiya.  Sithuvili sinhala  lamayek wage.

Musal manu anthawadi  pasalakata  giyanam.  Me lamaya godak  wenas  wenna thibuna.  Thamunge daruwanta  kiyala denawa  sinhala minissu  kiyanne kauda  kiyala.  Pathima  obata budu saranaii.
